tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_and_reviews_from_fashion_show (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    is_press_review BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE FeedbackFromPress (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  press_name VARCHAR(255),
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE FeedbackFromAttendees (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  attendee_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE EventMetrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE,
  total_attendees INT,
  satisfaction_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ImprovementSuggestions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  suggestion_text TEXT
)
